ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m afraid he s correct. Twinking is at an all time how now. The player run economy is all but non existant. Everything s falling apart. And now people
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Douglas Taylor <douglas@...>
>Heh - you might see that anyway. Last night I saw a level 10 wizard in
>a flowing black robe, shimmering orb, and one of those skull staves
>running from an orc centurion in the E. Commonlands.
>
>--
>We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
>with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
>of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
>

I'm afraid he's correct. Twinking is at an all time how now. The "player run
economy" is all but non existant. Everything's falling apart. And now people
are getting bored and are starting to hack at EQ. What's next? Let me guess.
Verant's going to release a patch that allows the sky to fall. But it'll fix
EVERYTHING as usual. >8)
